  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity(int worldX, int worldY, int speed, int maxHealth, BufferedImage image, int collisionBoundsXOffset, int collisionBoundsYOffset, int spriteWidthMargins, int spriteHeightMargins, EntityDirection entityDirection, boolean collidable)
      Constructs an Entity with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      worldX - The initial world X-coordinate of the entity.
      worldY - The initial world Y-coordinate of the entity.
      speed - The movement speed of the entity.
      maxHealth - The maximum health points of the entity.
      image - The image representing the entity.
      entityDirection - The initial direction of the entity.
      collidable - Determines if the entity can collide with other entities or tiles.
